caption.title: Temporal and spatial group effects for the epidemic intensity and epidemic duration surveillance models.
caption.p: A) The posterior mean and 95% credible intervals for group (random) effects are shown for log epidemic intensity. B) Continental U.S. county map for fitted log epidemic intensity for an example flu season (2006-2007). C) The posterior mean and 95% credible intervals for group (random) effects are shown for log epidemic duration. D) Continental U.S. county map for fitted epidemic duration for an example flu season (2006-2007).
